meanings.definition: Resembling a twig in shape or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The small, twiglike branches swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: Her hair was so thin and twiglike, it seemed to blend with the tree branches behind her.
meanings.sent3: The twiglike pencil was so thin, it kept snapping every time he tried to write with it.
meanings.sent4: His twiglike fingers delicately picked up the tiny seed from the ground.
meanings.sent5: The twiglike figure in the distance turned out to be a scarecrow standing in the field.
